Uses of Class
com.sap.conn.jco.JCoException

  • Packages that use JCoException 
    Package Description
    com.sap.conn.jco
    Contains the major part of the interfaces and factories that an application for JCo is typically dealing with.
    com.sap.conn.jco.ms
    Contains all interfaces of JCo related to system information queries.
    com.sap.conn.jco.server
    Contains the interfaces and factories for the RFC server functionality.

    • Uses of JCoException in com.sap.conn.jco

      Subclasses of JCoException in com.sap.conn.jco 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbapClassException
      This class represents an ABAP class exception.
      class  AbapException
      A convenience class on top of JCoException that reports exceptions, which occurred in an SAP system, while processing a function module.

      Executes the function on the given target destination in queued transactional mode using the qRfc protocol.
